channel.title: Possible ways of finding if an NPC is in combat?
channel.description:
Since there is not one server out there that properly uses the interaction flag, I need other stable ways to check if an NPC, or any entity, is in combat.
The only way I've thought of so far is checking if the hp bar/hit marks are being drawn
